meanings.sent1: After losing his job, he reearned his income by finding a new one.
meanings.sent2: She reearned the trust of her friends by apologizing sincerely.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel reearned the nuts it had hidden by remembering where they were buried.
meanings.sent4: The athlete reearned her title as champion after months of hard training.
meanings.sent5: The student reearned a passing grade on the test by studying diligently.

meanings.definition: To gain or acquire again through effort or work.
meanings.sent1: The artist reearned recognition for her paintings by participating in a gallery show.
meanings.sent2: He reearned the respect of his colleagues by consistently delivering high-quality work.
meanings.sent3: The dog reearned its favorite toy by performing tricks for its owner.
meanings.sent4: The company reearned its reputation by providing excellent customer service.
meanings.sent5: She reearned her spot on the team through hard work and dedication.
